h2_title: Where to Get the Sobering Stone
content: There are two ways to get the item required, one of which will cost you, and the other through exploring. If you complete the **Man-in-Stone’s questline**, you’ll find that the **Man-in-Stone** sells a **Sobering Stone** if you don’t want to explore. Since it costs a hefty 6,480 Will, you’re better off finding one yourself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Drunken_Boar_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Drunken Boar Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Get the Sobering Stone'.
The content is as follows:
There are two ways to get the item required, one of which will cost you, and the other through exploring. If you complete the **Man-in-Stone’s questline**, you’ll find that the **Man-in-Stone** sells a **Sobering Stone** if you don’t want to explore. Since it costs a hefty 6,480 Will, you’re better off finding one yourself.
